validation.usernameLetterRequired: Username must contain at least one latin letter (A-Z)
validation.emailNoWhitespace: Email must not contain any whitespace
validation.emailMustContainDomain: Email must contain a domain name (e.g., example.com)
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validation.passwordMaxLength: Password must be no more than 20 characters
validation.passwordSpecialCharRequired: Password must contain at least one special character (e.g., !@#$%^&?*)
validation.passwordUppercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z)
validation.passwordLowercaseRequired: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z)
validation.passwordDigitRequired: Password must contain at least one digit (0-9)
validation.passwordNoWhitespace: Password must not contain any whitespace characters

notifications.signInSuccess: Welcome back! You have successfully signed in to your account
notifications.signUpSuccess: Welcome aboard! Your account has been successfully created
notifications.authError: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again
notifications.networkError: Connection error! Please check your internet connection and try again
notifications.serverError: Server error! Something went wrong on our side. Please try again later

organize.description: Group your requests into projects and collections.

stardustmeg.description: Hi! I'm Meg. Frontend is my hobby turned obsession. I enjoy code reviews, suffer through bugs — it’s the best experience.

zagorky.description: Hi, I'm the dev who ships code then immediately hates it. It works... but what if I rewrite it just one more time?
